Player History
Injured on 9/24/1965 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 9 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1966...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1966, off Sammy Ellis (CIN)...
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Houston in 1973...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 1/31/1973 (Going to HOU: SS G. Gil. Going to CIN: P W. Hernandez)...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1979...
